Sodium Scorpio's Kellnerinnen-Rock mit Legwarmern

Falda de camarera rosa con calentadores de Scorpio’s en Sodium

Sodium Scorpio's Pink Waitress Skirt with Leg Warmers (Women)

Sodium Scorpio's Pink Waitress Skirt with Leg Warmers
kDesc
Wear this with the Pink Waitress Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
Portez cette jupe avec la chemise rose de serveuse pour servir au bar Scorpio’s afin de gagner des crédits Sodium. [#Legal]
Trage diesen Artikel mit dem pinken Kellnerinnen-Hemd, wenn du in Scorpio's Bar arbeitest, um Sodium-Credits zu verdienen. [#Legal]
Indossala insieme alla camicia da cameriera rosa mentre lavori al Bar Scorpio's per guadagnare Crediti Sodium. [#Legal]
Combínala con la camisa de camarera rosa mientras trabajas en Scorpio’s para conseguir créditos Sodium. [#Legal]
Scorpio's のバーで働いて Sodiumクレジットを稼ぐ際、このアイテムを着用しよう。 [#Legal]
이 치마를 분홍색 웨이트리스 셔츠와 함께 입고 Scorpio's 바에서 일하면 Sodium 포인트를 적립할 수 있습니다. [#Legal]
Wear this with the Pink Waitress Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服與粉紅色侍應生上衣，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
在 Scorpio's 酒吧工作時穿著本制服與粉紅色服務生上衣，可賺取Sodium積分。[#Legal]
Wear this with the Pink Waitress Shirt whilst working in Scorpio’s Bar to earn Sodium credits. [#Legal]
